about_the_game:
In 1947, the secret agency NASS was formed to decode mysterious cosmic signals, leading to Japan's technological boom. However, the ignition of a zero-point energy reactor in 1986, brought alien life and threw Earth into a battle for survival. Amid survivors, Haru ally with Yoshida, a man with NASS connections, and together, they navigate a world forever altered, with the hope to save Earth and those trapped in singularity anomalies.

Key Features:

  • IMMERSIVE STORYTELLING:
    Learn more about the invasion and its impact through the eyes of the people that Haru encounters on his journey.

  • INNOVATIVE COMBAT GAMEPLAY:
    Engage in combat utilizing innovative gravity and time-bending technology.

  • ATMOSPHERIC ART:
    Explore hand-painted levels with atmospheric artwork.

  • SOUNDTRACK:
    Immerse yourself in the atmosphere with a meticulously composed soundtrack.

content_descriptors.notes: The game will include multiple fight scenes with the enemy with various levels of gore. Such as decapitation of arms, legs or the head.

detailed_description:
In 1947, the secret agency NASS was formed to decode mysterious cosmic signals, leading to Japan's technological boom. However, the ignition of a zero-point energy reactor in 1986, brought alien life and threw Earth into a battle for survival. Amid survivors, Haru ally with Yoshida, a man with NASS connections, and together, they navigate a world forever altered, with the hope to save Earth and those trapped in singularity anomalies.

Key Features:

  • IMMERSIVE STORYTELLING:
    Learn more about the invasion and its impact through the eyes of the people that Haru encounters on his journey.

  • INNOVATIVE COMBAT GAMEPLAY:
    Engage in combat utilizing innovative gravity and time-bending technology.

  • ATMOSPHERIC ART:
    Explore hand-painted levels with atmospheric artwork.

  • SOUNDTRACK:
    Immerse yourself in the atmosphere with a meticulously composed soundtrack.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.01
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II x2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HD 4850
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Sierra - 10.12.6
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: KNIGHTS OF THE FALL

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E8400 or AMD Phenom II x2 550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260 or Radeon HD 4850
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750 or AMD Phenom II x4 945
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 or Radeon HD 5770
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: KNIGHTS OF THE FALL is a sci-fi 2D platformer that tells the story of Haru, an ex-military, and Yoshida, his resourceful scientist sidekick, who join forces to uncover how interdimensional travel, and the afterlife could be connected using time and gravity-bending technology.
